attributes.action: get TFL to give us refunds when the tubes are really delayed and impose heftier fines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr PM,

As you probably don't know (since you probably don't use the tube every day) the London Underground must arguably be the worst form of public transport ever. When we're not packed in like sardines we're transported at a temperature of higher than the limit legally allowed to transport livestock. Not to even mention the delays.

We call on you, our esteemed leader, to do something about this. We feel you should either force TFL to give us refunds on days like "Black Monday" and impose heftier fines when engineering works overrun.

Not only does bad public transport give us a really bad reputation overseas, it also puts tourists off from visiting London and spending more money. As leader I am sure I don't have to tell you what the potential implications are of this.

Olympics? Unless you sort this it will be the biggest joke ever. Kind of like the dome...
